production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
production.post-deploy: npm install ; grunt compile --sites=emerging-citizens ; pm2 restart server.js -- emerging-citizens --env production

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; grunt compile --sites=emerging-citizens ; pm2 restart server.js -- emerging-citizens --env staging

link.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking emerging-citizens and restarting app.';
link.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; pm2 restart server.js -- emerging-citizens --env staging

link-prod.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking emerging-citizens and restarting app.';
link-prod.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; pm2 restart server.js -- emerging-citizens --env production
